introduction: True Sight is an acclaimed Dota 2 documentary series that gives an inside look at the single most lucrative match in esports. Based on previous entries in the series, the True Sight for TI10 will be roughly 90 minutes long, The bulk of the content will be audio and video captured live at TI10. The True Sight episode covering TI10 will be seventh in the series and the third focusing on the grand finals of The International.
